org.ardenus.graphics.shader.constant

Class ShaderConstant<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.graphics.shader.constant.ShaderConstant<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NumberShaderConstant

    public abstract class ShaderConstant<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a value in GLSL that is defined using the #define command.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

    • Method Detail

      • applyConstants

        public static java.lang.String applyConstants(java.lang.String source)
        Applies the engine OpenGL version and constants to the source code by appending it to the beginning of the source code.
        Parameters:
        source - the source code to apply the constants to.
        Returns:
        the source code with the applied version and constants.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the name of the constant.

      • getValue

        public T getValue()
        Returns:
        the value of the object.

      • getValueStr

        public java.lang.String getValueStr()
        Converts the value returned from getValue() to a String. This is the method that should be used when preparing the shader to define the constant, as using getValue().toString() will sometimes throw an exception if the object being returned does not support being converted a String on its own.

      • toString

        public final java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
